topic.title: The XML Source
topic.p: The document() method lets you aggregate different XML files into a single document. In this demo, a single "master" file, doc_set.xml, lists the different topics in this document.
topic.code:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="next.xsl"?>
<doc> <title>Mozilla U. XSLT Demo</title> <item id="001" filename="demo_topic1.xml"/> <item id="002" filename="demo_topic2.xml"/> <item filename="demo_topic3.xml"/> <item filename="demo_topic4.xml"/> </doc>
